column1: Table 5.7: Salient details of Mawaramaditta tank and Wilpassa Wewa

column2: Shallow tank bed due to siltation. Small bund top width
column3: Farmers request to replace Pine plantation, Bund strengthening

column2:
1.Excavate upstream tank bed to a depth of 500mm. 
2.Bund Raise by 500mm and make the Bund top width as 3m with 1:2.5 side slopes using excavated materials.
3. Full turfing, Vetiver grass and areca edges along the HFL contour.
column3:
1.Tank widening by removing the earth and silt deposits. 
2. Upstream bund earth filling about 75m length to correct depressions, irregularities
3. Dense forest belt in immediate catchment
